page.title: 06THE HERLINGSHAW CENTRE
page.content: The centre itself is a recent building but the skating rink which it covers is 22 years old.The building is not only used for roller skating but for many other activities which includes BMX racing,Jazz Band displays,flower shows,five-a-side football and basketball.The centre is sometimes used as an indoor market.Attendance at the Centre can vary from as low as 10 to as high as two to three thousand per week.On a Friday evening the Centre is used for Roller Hockey matches and occasionally for Roller Discos. Four people work at the centre.It is open fro 5.45pm to 10.00pm daily. { { { { {
